mutants.code:
import re

def is_codwars_domain(url: str) -> bool:
    """
    Determines if the given URL belongs to the codwars.com domain.

    Args:
        url (str): The URL to be checked.

    Returns:
        bool: True if the URL belongs to the codwars.com domain, otherwise False.
    """
    return bool(re.match('', url))
